input.sentences: the family went out to an art show .
little [female] looked at the art like it was the best thing she ever seen .
and [male] was making silly faces in the camera .
[male] was getting really mad and wanted to go home .
their father agreed and his face says it all lets go home kids .
output.sentences: The family went to an art show.
The female girl looked at the amazing art.
Then a silly male jumped in front of the camera.
The male boy was mad and wanted to go home.
Father decided to take the kids home.
